sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) Receives Average Rating of "Moderate Buy" from Analysts
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) has received a "Moderate Buy" rating from analysts, with four buy ratings and one sell rating, and an average 12-month price target of $24.00. The company recently beat revenue estimates but missed on EPS for its most recent quarter, though analysts anticipate higher EPS for the current year. Institutional ownership stands at approximately 45.9%, with several funds increasing their positions.

feed.title: Moody National Bank Trust Division Takes $2.67 Million Position in Cellebrite DI Ltd. $CLBT
feed.summary: Moody National Bank Trust Division has initiated a new position in Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT), purchasing 144,100 shares valued at $2.67 million. This move aligns with increased institutional interest in Cellebrite, as other major institutions have also raised their holdings. The stock currently trades near $18.23, with analysts maintaining a "Moderate Buy" rating and an average target price of $24.00, despite a recent EPS miss.

feed.title: Cellebrite DI's (NASDAQ:CLBT) Investors Will Be Pleased With Their Massive 330% Return Over the Last Three Years
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) has delivered a massive 330% return to its investors over the last three years, largely driven by the company achieving profitability. While the stock has seen a recent dip of 2.9% in the last seven days and is down 12% for the year, its long-term performance remains strong. The article suggests that if long-term sustainable growth continues, the current sell-off could present an opportunity.

feed.title: Norwood Investment Partners Opens New $4.3 Million Cellebrite Position
feed.summary: Norwood Investment Partners, LP has established a new equity position in Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT), purchasing 230,671 shares valued at $4.27 million. This new investment represents 3.7% of the fund's total reportable assets under management, which now stand at $116.27 million across 15 positions. The transaction was disclosed in a recent SEC filing.

feed.title: Earnings call transcript: Cellebrite Q3 2025 beats EPS expectations, stock surges
feed.summary: Cellebrite (CLBT) exceeded Q3 2025 earnings expectations with an EPS of $0.14 and revenue of $126 million, leading to a 22.8% surge in after-hours trading. The company's strong performance was driven by 21% growth in subscription revenue and a robust gross margin of 84.5%, with strategic focus on cloud solutions and U.S. federal sector expansion. Cellebrite anticipates continued ARR growth in Q4 and 2025, with an optimistic outlook for accelerated top-line growth in 2026 driven by new product launches and market expansion.

feed.title: Jump Financial LLC Grows Stock Position in Cellebrite DI Ltd. $CLBT
feed.summary: Jump Financial LLC significantly increased its stake in Cellebrite DI Ltd. by 158.5% in Q2, acquiring 328,094 additional shares. Despite missing EPS estimates, Cellebrite reported robust revenue growth, and analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with target prices around $24-25. Other institutional investors also adjusted their positions in the company.

feed.title: 869,926 Shares in Cellebrite DI Ltd. $CLBT Acquired by Thematics Asset Management
feed.summary: Thematics Asset Management has acquired a new stake of 869,926 shares in Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) worth approximately $13.92 million. Other institutional investors like Voss Capital and Pertento Partners also adjusted their positions, bringing the total institutional and hedge fund ownership to about 45.88%. Despite missing EPS estimates in its last quarterly report, Cellebrite DI experienced a 17.9% revenue increase and holds a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating from analysts with an average target price of $24.00.

feed.title: Voss Capital LP Increases Stock Holdings in Cellebrite DI Ltd. $CLBT
feed.summary: Voss Capital LP significantly increased its stake in Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) by 34% in Q2, making the stock its 8th largest holding. This move comes despite Cellebrite missing EPS estimates but exceeding revenue expectations with a 17.9% year-over-year increase. Analyst sentiment for Cellebrite is generally positive, with a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating and an average price target of $24.

feed.title: Crescent Park Management L.P. Cuts Position in Cellebrite DI Ltd. $CLBT
feed.summary: Crescent Park Management L.P. reduced its stake in Cellebrite DI Ltd. by 16.6%, selling 113,179 shares, though it remains its 12th largest position. Despite this sale, other major institutions like Invesco, Phoenix Financial, and Royal Bank of Canada significantly increased their holdings, leading to an overall institutional ownership of 45.88%. Analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" consensus with an average target price of $24.00, despite the company missing EPS estimates in its latest quarterly results.

feed.title: Cellebrite DI (CLBT) Is Up 8.1% After Q3 Beat And Corellium Deal - What's Changed
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI (CLBT) recently exceeded Q3 expectations, driven by strong execution, demand for its digital investigation platforms, and the rapid growth of its Guardian solution. The acquisition of Corellium for US$170 million enhances Cellebrite's AI-powered investigation capabilities, broadening its potential use across defense, intelligence, and enterprise sectors. Despite contract delays in the U.S. federal segment, the Q3 performance and the Corellium deal suggest a positive shift in Cellebrite's investment narrative and long-term outlook.

feed.title: Quantbot Technologies LP Increases Position in Cellebrite DI Ltd. $CLBT
feed.summary: Quantbot Technologies LP significantly increased its stake in Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) during the second quarter, now holding 223,832 shares valued at approximately $3.58 million. Several other institutional investors also adjusted their positions in the digital intelligence solutions provider. Despite missing EPS estimates, Cellebrite DI's Q3 revenue beat expectations and analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with an average price target of $24.00.

feed.title: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (CLBT): A Bull Case Theory
feed.summary: This article summarizes a bullish thesis on Cellebrite DI Ltd. (CLBT), highlighting its strong Q3 earnings, operational leverage, impressive Guardian platform growth, and attractive valuation at 25x 2025 free cash flow despite near-term headwinds from U.S. federal contract delays and Sun Corp's stake reduction. The company's strategic diversification into defense and intelligence, coupled with long-term upside from FedRAMP investment, presents a compelling risk/reward scenario for investors.

feed.title: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (CLBT): A Bull Case Theory
feed.summary: This article summarizes a bullish thesis on Cellebrite DI Ltd. (CLBT) based on an analysis by KairosPraxis. The positive outlook is driven by the company's strong Q3 earnings, impressive operating leverage, and the growth of its Guardian platform, despite near-term challenges with U.S. federal contracts and a planned stake reduction by Sun Corp. The valuation is considered attractive at 25x 2025 free cash flow, suggesting potential for long-term upside.

feed.title: Cellebrite Completes Acquisition of Corellium, Extending
feed.summary: Cellebrite has completed its acquisition of Corellium, a leader in Arm-based virtualization software, significantly expanding its AI-powered digital investigation platform. This acquisition aims to provide unmatched capabilities in digital forensics, investigations, analytics, and intelligence by integrating Corellium's technology with Cellebrite's solutions. The merger strengthens Cellebrite's market leadership and offers advanced virtualization for mobile application development and vulnerability discovery, impacting defense, intelligence, and enterprise sectors.

feed.title: Cellebrite Di Ltd Not Updating Its Q4 And Full-Year 2025 Outlook At This Time
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd (CLBT) has announced that it is not updating its Q4 and full-year 2025 outlook at this time. The company stated that the Q4 impact from one month of Corellium's revenue and costs is not expected to be material.

feed.title: Cellebrite Completes Acquisition of Corellium, Extending the Industry’s Most Advanced AI-Powered Digital Investigation Platform
feed.summary: Cellebrite has acquired Corellium, a leader in Arm-based virtualization software, to enhance its AI-powered digital investigation platform. This acquisition aims to provide unmatched capabilities in digital forensics, investigations, analytics, and intelligence, accelerating evidence collection and threat detection. The deal, valued at $170 million, will integrate Corellium's technology to aid defense, intelligence, and enterprise customers in secure mobile application development, testing, and vulnerability discovery.

feed.title: Cellebrite (NASDAQ: CLBT) closes Corellium deal, adding Arm virtualization tech
feed.summary: Cellebrite (NASDAQ: CLBT) has completed its $170 million acquisition of Corellium, integrating Corellium's Arm-based virtualization technology with Cellebrite's AI-powered digital investigation platform. The deal involved $150 million cash at closing, $20 million in equity, and up to $30 million in performance-based cash. This acquisition is expected to enhance Cellebrite's capabilities for defense, intelligence, and enterprise clients, with Corellium's CTO Chris Wade joining Cellebrite's leadership.

feed.title: Cellebrite DI: Strong Q3, But Valuation And Technical Issues Could Weigh On The Stock (Rating Downgrade)
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI (CLBT) reported strong Q3 2025 earnings, surpassing analyst estimates with 18% year-over-year revenue growth. Despite its long-term growth potential and solid performance, the stock faces challenges from valuation and technical concerns. These factors could lead to further selling pressure or underperformance, warranting a downgrade from a previously positive outlook.

feed.title: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (CLBT) Stock Price | Live Quotes & Charts | NASDAQ
feed.summary: This page provides live stock quotes and charts for Cellebrite DI Ltd. (CLBT), showing its current trading price and daily change. It also includes sections for analyst ratings, earnings information, and promotional content for stock trading alerts and educational resources.

feed.title: Cellebrite Announces Third-Quarter 2025 Results
feed.summary: Cellebrite (NASDAQ: CLBT) announced strong financial results for the third quarter of 2025, exceeding adjusted EBITDA guidance and meeting revenue expectations. The company reported significant growth in ARR (19% to $439.8 million) and revenue (18% to $126.0 million), supported by strong performance in its U.S. Federal business and ongoing innovation with its Digital Investigation Platform. Cellebrite also provided financial guidance for the fourth quarter and full-year 2025, anticipating continued growth and profitability.

feed.title: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (CLBT) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (CLBT) reported Q3 earnings of $0.14 per share, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.13, and revenues of $126.03 million, exceeding the estimate by 2.22%. Despite beating estimates, the company's shares have underperformed the S&P 500 year-to-date, and it currently holds a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold). The outlook for the Internet - Software industry may significantly impact the stock's future performance.

feed.title: Cellebrite Appoints Holly Windham as General Counsel and Chief Compliance Officer
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd has appointed Holly Windham as its new General Counsel and Chief Compliance Officer. Ms. Windham brings extensive legal leadership experience from technology companies, including roles at Self Financial and Rackspace Technology, specializing in software, cloud platforms, cybersecurity, and data privacy. Her appointment is expected to bolster Cellebrite's continued growth and ensure appropriate use of its digital investigative technology globally.

feed.title: Assessing Cellebrite (NasdaqGS:CLBT) Valuation After Strong Revenue Growth and Share Price Momentum
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI (CLBT) has shown strong revenue growth and share price momentum, with a 281.93% three-year total shareholder return. Despite being considered 21.4% undervalued with a fair value of $23.14 per share based on its recurring revenue model, market multiples raise concerns, as its price-to-sales ratio of 10.2 is significantly higher than the US Software sector average. Investors are evaluating whether its impressive growth will outpace these valuation headwinds.

Details for accessing the call and webcast, along with supplemental financial data, have been provided.

feed.title: Third-Quarter 2025 Results: Cellebrite to Report Nov. 12; Live Call at Five p.m. ET - Stock Titan
feed.summary: Cellebrite (NASDAQ: CLBT) announced it will report its third-quarter 2025 financial results after the U.S. market close on Wednesday, November 12, 2025. The company will host a live conference call and webcast at 5:00 p.m. ET on the same day to review the results and discuss its full-year 2025 outlook. Historical financial tables and supplemental data will be posted on the investor relations section of Cellebrite's website.

feed.title: Cellebrite to Report Third-Quarter 2025 Financial Results on November 12, 2025
feed.summary: Cellebrite will report its third-quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, November 12, 2025, after the U.S. market closes. The company will host a live conference call and webcast on the same day to discuss the results and provide its full-year 2025 outlook. It presents three AI-generated trading strategies (Position, Momentum Breakout, Risk Hedging) and multi-timeframe signal analysis with specific support and resistance levels. The report highlights an exceptional 56.6:1 risk-reward short setup targeting a 15.1% downside.

feed.title: Cellebrite Expands Market Reach with Innovations in Agentic AI, Cloud and Device Virtualization for the Company’s Autumn 2025 Release
feed.summary: Cellebrite (NASDAQ: CLBT) announced its Autumn 2025 Release, featuring new integrations and capabilities for its Digital Investigation Platform, including agentic AI, cloud, and device virtualization. A key highlight is the integration of Corellium technology through a reseller agreement, offering powerful Arm-based mobile virtualization for iOS, Android, and IoT device analysis for defense, intelligence, and enterprise customers. The release also includes an expanded Guardian suite with SaaS offerings for digital forensics and investigations, and a new AWS GovCloud deployment option for Pathfinder.

feed.title: Cellebrite Expands Market Reach with Innovations in Agentic AI, Cloud and Device Virtualization for the Company’s Autumn 2025 Release
feed.summary: Cellebrite (NASDAQ: CLBT) announced its Autumn 2025 Release, bringing significant advancements to its Digital Investigation Platform. Key innovations include the integration of Corellium technology for Arm-based mobile virtualization, an expanded Guardian suite with agentic AI-powered investigations, and enhanced access to Android and iOS devices through Inseyets. These updates aim to strengthen digital forensics capabilities for public safety and enterprise customers.

feed.title: Cellebrite Expands Market Reach with Innovations in Agentic AI, Cloud and Device Virtualization for the Company’s Autumn 2025 Release - Yahoo Finance
feed.summary: Cellebrite announced its Autumn 2025 Release, featuring significant advancements in agentic AI, cloud, and device virtualization. Key innovations include an expanded Guardian suite with a new AI-powered "Guardian Investigate" solution, enhanced access to mobile devices through Inseyets, and AWS GovCloud deployment for Pathfinder. The release also integrates Corellium technology through a reseller agreement, providing advanced Arm-based mobile virtualization for security research and testing.

(CLBT) in its Q3 2025 investor letter, noting its position as a market leader in digital forensics with strong potential for future growth. ClearBridge described Cellebrite as a software company providing a platform for digital investigation, primarily for law enforcement customers. While the fund acknowledged Cellebrite's potential, it suggested other AI stocks might offer quicker, higher returns.

feed.title: What Makes Cellebrite DI Ltd. (CLBT) a Lucrative Investment?
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) is highlighted as a lucrative investment by ClearBridge Small Cap Growth Strategy in its third-quarter 2025 investor letter. The company, a market leader in digital forensics, is noted for its software platform used for legally sanctioned investigations, primarily by law enforcement. ClearBridge anticipates future growth and attractive profitability due to logical additions to its platform.

feed.title: 14,000 Shares in Cellebrite DI Ltd. $CLBT Bought by Venturi Wealth Management LLC - MarketBeat
feed.summary: Venturi Wealth Management LLC recently acquired 14,000 shares of Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) worth approximately $224,000 during the second quarter. Other institutional investors also adjusted their holdings in the company. Cellebrite DI exceeded earnings expectations with reported EPS of $0.12 and an 18.4% year-over-year revenue increase, though analyst ratings remain mixed.

feed.title: What Cellebrite DI Ltd.'s (NASDAQ:CLBT) 26% Share Price Gain Is Not Telling You
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) recently saw a 26% share price gain, though its annual return is only 4.1%. Despite strong historical revenue growth, the company's P/S ratio of 9.6x is significantly higher than industry averages, and analyst forecasts predict weaker future revenue growth compared to the Software industry. This disparity suggests potential overvaluation, placing shareholder investments at risk.

feed.title: Earnings Beat: Cellebrite DI Ltd. Just Beat Analyst Forecasts, And Analysts Have Been Updating Their Models
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) reported strong quarterly results, with EPS beating analyst predictions by 16% and revenues in line with expectations. Following these results, analysts have become slightly more optimistic about the company's earnings potential for 2025, although the consensus price target saw a slight decrease. The company is expected to continue its historical revenue growth rate, aligning with the broader industry.

feed.title: Cellebrite’s Strategic Sponsorship Boosts Stock
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ: CLBT) stock surged by 10.01% following the U.S. Department of Justice’s offer to sponsor its pursuit of FedRAMP High authorization, which is crucial for government cloud offerings. This development is expected to significantly enhance Cellebrite's market footprint and drive future collaborations within government sectors. Despite past revenue fluctuations, the company shows financial robustness with strong cash positions and efficiency in profit generation, as analysts evaluate the strategic implications of this partnership.

feed.title: Cellebrite DI Ltd. 2025 Q2 - Results - Earnings Call Presentation (NASDAQ:CLBT) 2025-08-14
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ:CLBT) released its Q2 2025 earnings call presentation, reporting EPS of $0.12, beating estimates by $0.01, and revenue of $113.28M, an 18.35% year-over-year increase, beating by $1.07M. This article provides the slide deck accompanying the earnings call, published by SA Transcripts.

feed.title: Cellebrite Names David Barter Chief Financial Officer
feed.summary: Cellebrite (NASDAQ: CLBT) has announced the appointment of David Barter as its new Chief Financial Officer, effective immediately. Barter, a seasoned finance executive with extensive public company CFO experience in technology and software, succeeds Dana Gerner, who is retiring after serving as CFO since 2014. Gerner will remain in an advisory role during the transition, and Barter will be responsible for Cellebrite's financial operations, corporate development, investor relations, and operations.

feed.title: Cellebrite Appoints Marcus Jewell as Chief Revenue Officer
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. has appointed Marcus Jewell as Global Chief Revenue Officer, effective November 15, 2023. Jewell brings over 25 years of experience in senior-level sales and management, previously driving significant growth at Juniper Networks and increasing market share at Mitel Networks and Brocade. In his new role, he will oversee worldwide sales for both public and private sectors, aiming to accelerate revenue growth and expand customer relationships.

feed.title: Cellebrite Elevates Digital Forensics Training with New MyCellebrite Learning Hub
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. has launched a new MyCellebrite Learning Hub, featuring a cutting-edge website and Learning Management System, to enhance digital forensics training for investigative agencies. This platform provides flexible learning options and improved accessibility, underscoring Cellebrite's leadership in digital forensics education. The new hub aims to empower law enforcement personnel with advanced strategies to solve cases more efficiently and defensibly.

feed.title: Cellebrite to Report Third-Quarter 2023 Financial Results on November 14, 2023
feed.summary: Cellebrite (NASDAQ: CLBT) announced it will report its third-quarter 2023 financial results on Tuesday, November 14, 2023, before market open. The company will also host a live conference call and webcast on the same morning to discuss the results and its full-year 2023 outlook. Details for accessing the call and webcast have been provided, along with information on how to access historical financial tables and supplemental data.

feed.title: Cellebrite Appoints Thomas E. Hogan as Executive Chairman of the Board
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. has appointed Thomas E. Hogan as Executive Chairman of the Board. Hogan brings over 40 years of experience in technology leadership, M&A, sales, and marketing, and will partner with CEO Yossi Carmil to drive the company's growth and strategic priorities. Current non-executive chairman Haim Shani will remain an active board member.

feed.title: Cellebrite to Report Second-Quarter 2023 Financial Results on August 8, 2023
feed.summary: Cellebrite (NASDAQ: CLBT) announced it will report its second-quarter 2023 financial results before market open on Tuesday, August 8, 2023. The company will also host a live conference call and webcast on the same morning to review Q1 2023 financial results and discuss its full-year 2023 outlook. Details for accessing the call and webcast, along with investor relations information, are provided.

feed.title: Cellebrite announces innovative case-closing technology, raising the bar for modern investigations
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd. announced its new UFED Ultra solution, designed to expand and accelerate data access, extraction, decoding, and review capabilities for law enforcement. This technology aims to streamline investigative workflows and deliver court-ready digital evidence faster, enhancing the ability of agencies worldwide to solve crimes. UFED Ultra provides unparalleled access and extraction capabilities, empowering over 40,000 examiners globally to stay ahead of digital-savvy criminals.

feed.title: Redefining the Value of Digital Evidence in Creating Actionable Intelligence
feed.summary: This article discusses how redefining the value of digital evidence is crucial for creating actionable intelligence in modern investigations. It highlights the need for a new framework focusing on people, processes, platforms, and promises to transform mobile device data into actionable insights, ultimately improving case closure rates and prosecutorial outcomes. The author emphasizes moving from traditional top-down approaches to a more agile system utilizing simultaneous decrypting and decoding of digital data, supported by skilled personnel, integrated processes, and scalable platforms.

feed.title: Should You Now Consider Acquiring Cellebrite (CLBT) Shares?
feed.summary: Greenhaven Road Capital discussed Cellebrite DI Ltd. (NASDAQ: CLBT) in its Q2 2022 investor letter, highlighting its position as a newer holding and its severely compressed multiple. The company, an Israel-based digital intelligence firm, has faced investor skepticism despite its self-funding history and critical role in law enforcement. Despite a significant year-to-date decline in stock performance, the fund views it as a valuable long-term investment.

feed.title: Cellebrite Wins Significant Open-Source Intelligence Solutions Customer Contract
feed.summary: Cellebrite (Nasdaq: CLBT) announced a significant multi-year Open-Source Intelligence ("OSINT") customer contract valued at US$1.5 million for the first year, making it their most noteworthy SaaS deal to date. This contract reinforces Cellebrite's market leadership in providing end-to-end technology solutions for law enforcement, particularly in addressing crimes against children, drug and human trafficking, organized crime, and terrorism. The OSINT solution, part of Cellebrite's Digital Intelligence Platform, enables law enforcement to quickly collect and connect fragmented digital evidence from various web sources.

feed.title: Cellebrite to Acquire Digital Clues, Strengthening Its Market Leading Position as the End-To-End Investigative Digital Intelligence Platform Provider
feed.summary: Cellebrite (Nasdaq: CLBT) announced its definitive agreement to acquire the assets of open-source intelligence firm Digital Clues AG. This acquisition aims to strengthen Cellebrite's Digital Intelligence platform, digitize investigative workflows, and expand its footprint in law enforcement intelligence and investigation units globally. The acquisition is expected to close in the fourth quarter of 2021.

feed.title: Cellebrite Completes Business Combination with TWC Tech Holdings II Corp.
feed.summary: Cellebrite DI Ltd., a leader in Digital Intelligence solutions, has completed its business combination with TWC Tech Holdings II Corp. The combined entity will trade on Nasdaq under the symbol "CLBT" starting August 31, 2021. This transaction generated approximately $370 million in gross proceeds and positions Cellebrite to expand its reach in the Digital Intelligence market.
